languages.text: "Благодарю, но я вынуждена отказаться от столь сомнительного удовольствия. Мои глаза слезятся от едкой зелени, окружающий его листья. Будь на то моя воля — я бы приказала немедленно их изрубить!"

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, но я вынуждена отказаться от столь сомнительного удовольствия. Мои глаза слезятся от едкой зелени, окружающий его листья. Будь на то моя воля — я бы приказала немедленно их изрубить!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, но я вынуждена отказаться от столь сомнительного удовольствия. Мои глаза слезятся от едкой зелени, окружающий его листья. Будь на то моя воля — я бы приказала немедленно их изрубить!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, but I have to decline such a dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「お気持ちは嬉しいのですが、このような怪しげな楽しみはお断りさせていただきます。葉を覆う刺激的な緑のせいで目に涙が…あたくしにお任せいただけるのなら、すぐにでも切り刻むよう命じるでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"

traits.locale_text: 「お気持ちは嬉しいのですが、このような怪しげな楽しみはお断りさせていただきます。葉を覆う刺激的な緑のせいで目に涙が…あたくしにお任せいただけるのなら、すぐにでも切り刻むよう命じるでしょう！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias, pero debo renunciar a tan dudoso placer. Mis ojos lagrimean por el verde ácido que rodea sus hojas. Si dependiera de mí, ¡haría que se las cortaran de inmediato!».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, pero debo renunciar a tan dudoso placer. Mis ojos lagrimean por el verde ácido que rodea sus hojas. Si dependiera de mí, ¡haría que se las cortaran de inmediato!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “谢谢，但容我拒绝这份可疑的好意。周围这片可怕的绿色害得我泪流不止，如果你要问我的意见，我会下令立刻把它剁碎！”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"

traits.locale_text: “谢谢，但容我拒绝这份可疑的好意。周围这片可怕的绿色害得我泪流不止，如果你要问我的意见，我会下令立刻把它剁碎！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Merci d'avoir pensé à moi, mais je préfère m'abstenir de profiter de ce plaisir suspect. Le vert âcre qui entoure les feuilles me fait larmoyer. Si cela ne tenait qu'à moi, j'ordonnerais que l'on arrache cette plante ! »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"

traits.locale_text: « Merci d'avoir pensé à moi, mais je préfère m'abstenir de profiter de ce plaisir suspect. Le vert âcre qui entoure les feuilles me fait larmoyer. Si cela ne tenait qu'à moi, j'ordonnerais que l'on arrache cette plante ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Danke, doch ich muss dieses dubiose Vergnügen leider ablehnen. Meine Augen tränen von dem beißenden Grün, das die Blätter umgeht. Ginge es nach mir, würde ich sofort Befehl erteilen, sie zu zerhacken!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"

traits.locale_text: "Danke, doch ich muss dieses dubiose Vergnügen leider ablehnen. Meine Augen tränen von dem beißenden Grün, das die Blätter umgeht. Ginge es nach mir, würde ich sofort Befehl erteilen, sie zu zerhacken!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim ancak ne idiği belirsiz zevklerden mahrum kalmam gerekecek. Yapraklarını saran keskin yeşil, gözlerimi yaşartıyor. Bana kalsa hemen tüm yaprakların kesilmesini emrederdim!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you, but I will have to decline such dubious pleasure. My eyes are watering from the acrid green that surrounds its leaves. If it were up to me, I would order to have them chopped up right away!"
